1.content:
In the light of midday, a shadowed figure could be seen on the bed of Takato's parents. Zooming in closer, it became apparent that the lone figure was actually two, well one and a half; a pair of legs struggled from the outside of a very hungry Renamon. Tilting her head back, hands on belly, Renamon took one satisfying slurp, letting Takato's mother slide down into her eager belly.

*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURB*

"Excuse me" said Renamon, giggling. She gave her squirming belly a pat, letting out another loud belch.

"Who would have thought human could taste sooo good", she said.

Renamon had just finished eating Takato's parents. The bloated fox rested in their bed, massaging her full, belly enjoying the feeling of overstuffedness. Whatever impulse it had been, whether it was a virus, some dastardly plot, or it was just in her nature, Renamon had become overcome with the desire to devour human flesh. She lay in bed, cooing her full stomach, thinking to herself about her current predicament, but thinking nothing of it, decided to move on.

"Well I better check on my partner" she said walking down the stairs. There she found Guilmon, his belly bloated from eating Takato. Renamon had convinced him to eat his trainer as she had done earlier, to free himself from his (as she put it), tyrannical grip. Now they were free to do as they please.

She gave her belly a pat, her previous meals beginning to digest.

"Already getting hungry again" she said, somewhat surprised at her own gluttony.

Staring at Guilmon, Renamon decided what her next meal should be...

Renamon easily polished off the food in the surprisingly large bag, patting her immense belly and belching, hefting herself to her feet. She licked her lips and looked up at Rika, amused by the lusty expression on her face. "Feeling frisky now that we're both so huge?" she teased. She admitted that she had been having intimate thoughts. Digimon normally didn't think in terms of gender, but Renamon was well aware that she was female, especially after discovering sex a few days before her desire to consume had set in. And the more she thought about it, the more she liked the idea of being intimate with her Tamer while they were both huge and fat.

Rika blushed. "Yeah, I guess. But I think I wanna see us both get a bit bigger first," she said.

Renamon patted her gigantic tummy. "We get any bigger it's gonna be harder for us to make out, Rika."

Rika grinned. "I know, but think of how much fun it will be to try. Especially with so much soft flesh on us to caress," she said.

Renamon blushed, admitting to herself that she did indeed rather like that idea. "Well, let's go find something to eat then," she said, grinning as an idea occured to her, "I want to see if you can eat a human as well."

Rika blushed. "Well, if that's the case, I do have someone in mind for us to eat next."

Renamon churred, her tail flitting about. "Oooh? Who? My belly's rumbling already."

"Mom and Grandma," Rika said simply.

Renamon blinked. "...Are you sure?"

Rika blushed, and hugged Renamon. "I have you," she said, Renamon feeling an intense surge of love through the mental connection they shared, "I don't need anyone else."

Renamon hugged her chubby Tamer tightly, and nodded. "Then let's go eat them. I assume, since you said for 'us' to eat, you want to eat either your Mom or your Grandmother?"

Rika nodded. "My Grandma. She's a bit smaller than Mom. Plus, I want to tease Mom as she goes down your throat."

Renamon grinned. That vicious streak in Rika was part of what attracted her to the young girl in the first place.

Rika blushed, and added. "And maybe, when we're ready to sleep, I can be eaten by you again and sleep in your belly?"

Renamon blinked. "You... WANT to be eaten again?"

Rika grinned. "Hey, I came back before, right? Besides, you have a comfortable tummy. And if I don't come back... well, it felt wonderful being a part of you, even as just bellyfat."

This time it was Rika who felt an intense surge of love through their mental connection. Renamon blushed, coughing to compose herself, and said, "Well. Shall we go visit your mother, then? Or maybe stop off somewhere for a snack first?"

Only a few rooftops later she came across what looked like to be a fine place to fill the massive void that was her appetite. She landed gracefully in front of the establishment that caught her eye from a far. Tilting her head, up with her deep blue eyes shining in the brilliant moonlight, she looked with a smile and declared out loud "this is going to be good". Renamon, hardly being able to control herself, quickly made her way for the front door. She nearly had to turn sideways to allow her massive hips to fit through the single frame door. Renamon began to think if this sudden weight gain was to drastic, however this idea was quickly pushed aside when her nose picked up the familiar scent of food.

Renamon stared with complete amazment at the wide range of many different foods laid out before her. From every kind of protein to the smallest type of vegitable, it was all there. Renamon wasted no time and quickly went to work stacking large amounts of food on her plate. She returned to her table and swiftly sat down, the chair made a loud creek noise as she rested her newly in-larged ass upon it. She dinned on things such as grilled chicken breast, creamy mashed potatoes, delicous macaroni and cheese, and soft buttermilk biscuits.

The hours quickly flew by as Renamon went back and forth from the buffet to her table for plate after plate. Browsing over the dessert section of the buffet her eye ran over a dish in-titled "peanut butter cookies". Even thou her eating habits had taken a turn for the worst she still had retained some descente manners, and decided to wash up before departing. As she was washing her hands she overheard a conversation at the front of the store through the air event located above the mirror of the sink she was at. Apparently the local authorities where called due to the fact some large fox like creature was eating up large amounts of food without paying. The manager went on to explain how no one approached her during this process in fear of there life. This sent Renamon into a quick panic,"what am i going to do" she muttered after she locked the restroom door. As she was quickly moving her head about the tiny room she spotted a window above one of the stalls. Renamon knew she had little hope of being able to squeeze through this small exit, but she had to try. The restroom door then came crashing open with a bang, Renamon thought she was done for. However she was surprise to hear a familiar voice, "Renamon?" said Guilmon. 15.content:
Author's Note: I am writing this in leu of some wonderful art I happened to request. This story arc is completely different from the rest of it, and hopefully, this will have a bit more substance. I would like to use the first option of each part open, so if you do with to add, please do so on a separate option. Thank you and enjoy!

===========
Prologue

It had only been a few years this the fighting had ended, but ended it had. The digital world as - well as the real world - had remained suspiciously out of peril from supernatural causes. Was it a cause to worry? Not really; if trouble did arise there would always be heroes to quell it. But for now, the world had stayed surprisingly out of harms way.

In the years that had passed, Rika and Renamon had enjoyed a life of relative ease. In their years together, the two had practically become one. Though their bodies remained separate, Rika's thoughts and desires were shared by Renamon, and vice versa. It was a powerful bond, and it was because of this that the two had become a powerful force in the face of an enemy.

This is where are story begins.
============

It was an odd thing for her to do, but Renamon couldn't help but wonder what it was like. She witnessed first hand its intoxicating powers of people, and had even seen Rika's mother indulge in it every once in a while. In fact, alcohol was even present in the digital world, though it was not often consumed by a great warrior like Renamon. Still, she had to try it just once, and it was from the smallest sip of sake that Renamon would come to realize a hidden desire: her ravenous hunger for food.

It was odd actually, how the effects that alcohol had on Digimon. In Lamen's terms, alcohol triggered a mechanism in the Digimon's brain that made their cravings become uncontrollable, sometimes for long periods of time. For Renamon, this craving just so happened to be food.

So once Renamon had taken a taste of the bottle, her hunger would come to grow. It was slow at first, but Renamon began to eat with a newfound vigor. Actually, she knew a good place in the digital world simply called "Good Food" and Renamon soon found herself their everyday, bingeing on outrageous portions of food.

Naturally as her appetite grew, so did her body. Renamon had begun to lose her svelte, sleek form and in its place was a soft mass of fat. Renamon's limbs had thickened considerably, and roll of neck fat had begun to form. Her belly formed a large amount of soft flab, and her breasts began to perk out from under her collar. Renamon had gotten adorably chubby.

The digimon however took little notice to her new blubber, and continued to eat and drink and be merry. She sometimes found herself awoken in bed, the tastes of food in her mouth and her paws rubbing her bloated mass of belly. Gluttony had become a pleasure.

This new habit and taste for food had not gone unnoticed by Rika, and the girl found it strange how much she had come to enjoy each meal. Rika however had not yet begun to feel the exotic pull of gluttony which Renamon did, but as Renamon began to grow noticably fatter Rika knew where her cravings were coming from.

"You know Renamon you've been getting fat" she interrupted Renamon's eating one day. Renamon looked at her tamer with curiosity, and let out a small sigh.

"I know, I know." She began slowly, looking herself over. "But I can't help it!" she suddenly stammered. "I just can't live without food anymore, and this," she said, grabbing a paw-full of belly.

Rika studied her partner briefly before saying quietly, "And neither can I. Take me with you to the digital world. I crave it just as much as you."

Renamon grinned, and the two left for Good Food.

151.content:
It has been weeks since Renamon had ventured into the lands of gluttony. Renamon and Rika had been eating plentifully and their bodies had definitely begun to show it. Renamon had exploded into fatness, the fox had been gorging herself constantly. A soft fleshy mass of belly hung down from her body, and rolls cascaded from her back and sides. Currently, Renamon was in the midst of devouring a cake, belly pushing up against a table while she shoveled in handfuls of cake.

Rika had also gotten quite fat, her thighs had thickened considerably, and her face had begun to look very plump. Rika's belly bulged out happily from her tightening shirt, and she too had come to lover her new fatness. Rika, like Renamon, sat at the table stuffing herself with whatever food just so happened to be there. Good Food had certainly been accommodating for the gluttonous couple, and the owners let the lucky digidestined eat all they wanted, free of charge.

"UUUUURP," belched Renamon, "That was fantastic" she said exasperated, patting her flabby belly. "I don't think I have room for much more," she said, kneading her doughy belly.

"Me neither" said Rika, leaning back to rub her engorged belly in slow circles. The two sat enjoying their food stuffed stupor, until heaving their heavy bodies up to leave. Renamon grabbed one last piece of pizza and handed it to Rika before they left: "Just one last one."

http://SSsilver.deviantart.com/art/Shape...

========

"What would my mom say if she saw me now?" giggled Rika, patting her belly. Rika had been spending much of her time in the digital world, where time in the real world remained still. For the few times she had ventured home, she made sure to stay out of sight from her mother. Actually, Rika had been visiting Takato and Guilmon: she always got her fill of food from their bakery. It was clear they could tell she had put on her fair share of weight, but they hadn't said anything to her yet so she didn't really care.

Besides, she simply loved being fat. Though perhaps less so then Renamon.

The pair sat in the sun relaxing. Renamon lay against a tree, feeling her folds of fat in between her paws. Rika watched her as she massaged her flabby body, and realized that if this kept up, she'd end up the exact same way. As Renamon drifted to sleep, Rika could hear her whispering in her sleep about dreams of continued fatness. Rika closed her eyes, and dreamed too of growing fat.

========

While Rika slept, Renamon stirred in hunger.

Renamon returned to Good Food religiously. Her hunger was becoming more insatiable, and her body continued to expand. She sat at the table, alone, surrounded by plentiful amounts of food. Jelly filled donuts, eclairs, burgers, fries, pancakes, and other wonderful delights all met an end at her belly. Having taken the better part of the hour to engorge herself with these delights, Renamon let out a hefty wet belch before taking in the effects of her eating.

Renamon groaned in pleasure, pawing her flabby belly. She pawed at handfuls of doughy fat, and reaching the bottom of her belly, pushed it onto the table. The sight of her own engorged gut expanding across the table was sickeningly arousing, and for a minute or two she could only moan in gluttonous satisfaction at her surprisingly ability to gain weight.

After making sure to ease her bloated stomach, Renamon stood and made for Rika.

1511.content:
The passage of time continued, and as it did, Renamon and Rika continued to grow. The pair had finally ventured back into the real world, though the transition was not as smooth as it could have been. Needless to say, at the sight of her expanded daughter, Mrs. Nonaka had very few words to describe this sudden horror. It did not take long for Rika's mother to throw quite the strong fit, and the pair were thusly outcasted and staying at Takato's place, giving her mother a bit of time to cool off.

Of course the two were not in dismay, as Takato had a plentiful stockpile of goodies, not only because they owned a bakery but Guilmon was not exactly the lightest eater as well. Takato had no way to refuse the pair and although he did become slightly concerned at the sight of the overweight duo, he couldn't help but feel a little at ease with the fact that Rika was being genuinely nice when first entering the premise. Perhaps with her love of indulgence came a new set of relaxed emotion.

It didn't take long for the two to start eating, and eating became a long ordeal. The two were unstoppable and at one meal, Guilmon attempted to trump the gluttonous pair. The three sat up in Takato's room, stuffing their faces with whatever was in reach, and Takato had the unfortunate task of retrieving the food. It took an good hour before Guilmon gave up, bloated and completly stuffed he moaned and massaged his over-full stomach. Rika slowed down a bit, beginning to savor what little room she had left. Renamon gave her gut a few happy pats before continuing to dig in.

================

A week passed and Rika and Renamon showed no signs of moving. In fact, the two did very little of that at all. When Takato came up to his room, he found the two feeding each other; Renamon lay on top her massive belly, while Rika lay back, gut surging out from her shirt.

http://SSsilver.deviantart.com/art/In-ro...

For some reason Takato couldn't help but enjoy the sight, so he simply watched without a word. After having engorged themselves to an unbelievable capacity, the two lay on their backs, belching loudly. Renamon's paws were all over her flabby mass, exploring between her rolls and tightly packed belly. Rika undid her belt and unzipped her pants, allowing her belly to fill out fully. She smiled as she brought her hands to the creamy blubber. Her tight stomach had been covered by fresh layers of flab and the feeling brought out immense pleasure. Renamon dug her hands underneath her immense bulk and shook her soft belly, watching the bloated mass quiver and slosh.

Takato felt tempted to feel their full bellies as well, though he resisted the strange urge. He couldn't help but wonder how much bigger the two were going to get...
